reviewsJson.markdown:
WF SC Deep Fried Pastry Dough


Mixed 2% 70/30  Tested on B2K V4 SS316L stagger fused clapton .2 ohm 40 watts. Steeped for 4 weeks and tested once a week. Flavoring was purchased from GREMLIN DIY


Wonder Flavours Description:
A deep fried pastry dough with light notes of spice. They suggest mixing 1-4% 


Freshly mixed:
On back of hand taste sweet and doughy. Vaped it doesnâ€™t have much flavor at all. 


Week 1:
Getting a strange borderline rotten fruit note and some oiliness. 


Week 2: 
Fruit and oil are both still there and are over taking any dough like notes. Also the spices WF mentions in the description are coming through. 


Week 3&4:
Both off notes are still there and seem to have gotten stronger. Taste like someone had some raspberries that were about to rotten. Breaded them and put some all spice or nutmeg on them. Then deep fried them. Threw the raspberries away then decided to vape the left over oil. Sorry not trying to sound like    
/u/id10-t but that is the best way i can describe what i am tasting. 


I rate this 2/5 i would of rated this lower but 
/u/mlNikon made it work very well at 1.5% in the recipe i tested this flavor in. 

https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/64495#guava_empanada_by_mlnikon
reviewsJson.author: ebc88
reviewsJson.title: Deep Fried Pastry Dough
